text:
I realize this is my fault for just not thinking about it but I am currently building out a new theme in a new clients portal and I missed the part that the portal itself is currently a sandbox but the client themselves will be on starter meaning that I just wasted a bunch of time building out hubdb and a couple of modules.

It would be amazing if there was a banner above enterprise features in a sandbox saying something like "You're in a sandbox account and this feature may not be available to all portals" or something to keep me from doing bonehead things like this.
